newsList.title: «Kyrgyzelectronics» is ready to transfer more than 30 thousand KKM machines to the State Tax Service of the Kyrgyz Republic
newsList.description: Subsidiary of Kyrgyzindustry OJSC Kyrgyzelectronics LLP is ready to transfer 32 thousand.

newsList.title: Kyrgyzelectronics exported products worth more than 12 mln soms
newsList.description: According to the results of 2023, the subsidiary of Kyrgyzindustry OJSC - Kyrgyzelectronics LLC exported products worth 12.5 million KGS. This was reported by the head of the enterprise Ilya Cherny.

newsList.title: Contract signed between Kyrgyzelectronics LLC and New H3C Technologies LLC
newsList.description:
A contract was signed between Kyrgyzelectronics LLP and New H3C Technologies LLC.
On April 13, 2023 in the office of Kyrgyzindustry JSC was held a meeting of the President of Kyrgyzindustry JSC J.O.

newsList.title: Kyrgyzelectronics will start producing switches and servers
newsList.description: Kyrgyzelectronics will produce and carry out large-scale assembly of switching and server equipment under its own brand, reported Kyrgyzindustriya OJSC (Kyrgyzelectronics is its subsidiary).
